annotation: during dry season from forests; anytime but usually early morning and it gets cold
Means 'variable wind'; a lexical opposition between this word and another has not been found

language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect

annotation: To blow (of wind); sound of wind

language: Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: Souffler, etre bruyant (se dit du vent seul) (Jnu)
south-east wind - a cool, pleasant wind
wind and rain that blows into the house
also means 'ghost, spirit', cf. PAN *qanitu 'spirit, soul'
not a general term for wind-MW.
Wind n, weather, position of wind, eastern (Ebt)
